title: When do we get sandbox mode?
body:
So people stop practicing builds and new champs in ranked. 

or can we have the real non-ranked team builder back?

or can you do SOMETHING so people can learn the game?

replies.body: Make a custom game with 5 beginner bots, farm em, there ya go.
Bots are very very very inaccurate and teach bad habits.
Literally never. I could personally care less b/c ill never use it. But riot has no intention to add it
